content: about camden beanie this beanie knits fast and is very beginner friendly since it uses only knits and purls knitted in the round means no seaming together edges pom is optional size one size fits most adults will stretch to accommodate head circumference of 20-22 5 inches knitting needles 16 circular needle us 11/8mm 16 circular needle us 13/9mm double pointed needles us 13/9mm yarn 70 yards super bulky 6 yarn yarn pictured is malabrigo rasta in color whole grain 90yd/150g yarn alternative lion brand wool ease thick and quick 106 yd/170g notions stitch marker measuring tape scissors yarn needle faux pom optional this pattern and photographs of the design belong to the layered thread please do not recreate distribute or sell this pattern you are welcome to sell your finished items made from this pattern but please give pattern credit to the layered thread @thelayeredthread in your description thank you for supporting small business gauge body 9 sts x 15 row in block pattern = 4 x 4 inches switch to circular us 13/9mm knitting needles on next round hint knit pattern over 18 stitches and 24 row to check gauge and remainder of pattern gauge pattern rounds 1 and 2 knit all stitches rounds 1 and 2 knit all stitches rounds 3-6 *k2 p4* repeat from * to * rounds 3-6 *k2 p4* repeat from * to * rounds 7 and 8 knit all rounds 7 and 8 knit all round 9-12 *p3 k2 p1* repeat from * to * round 9-12 *k3 p2 k1* repeat from * to * repeat rounds 1 through 12 one more time hat will repeat these 12 row measure approximately 7 inches from cast on edge abbreviations shape crown decrease k= knit switch to dpn p=purl round 1 *k2tog repeat * till end of round 21 stitches k2tog = knit two together remain st= stitch round 2 knit all stitches dpn = double pointed needles round 3 *k2tog repeat till last stitch knit last stitch 11 stitches pattern instructions finishing break off 6-8 inches of yarn using yarn needle weave tail brim through the remaining stitches and pull to close hat weave in with us 11/8mm circular needle cast on 42 stitches all ends attach faux pom if desired long tail cast on was used for this pattern rounds 1-5 *k1 p1* to end brim will measure
